casebody.data:
DEVINE v. METROPOLITAN ST. RY. CO. (City Court of New York,

General Term.

May 26, 1899.) Action by James Devine against the Metropolitan Street-Railway Company. From a judgment on a verdict for plaintiff, and from an order denying a motion for.a new trial made on the judge’s minutes, defendant appeals. Affirmed. Henry A. Robinson, for appellant. Hays, Greenbaum & Hershfield, for respondent. PER CURIAM.

Judgment and order appealed from affirmed, with costs.
